website_summaries.verdict: This antibacterial, antimicrobial mat keeps your bathroom looking and smelling great.
pros: Slatted for optimal air circulation and quick drying
cons: Slatted design can let water pool in the bottom
Consider propping against the wall to dry after you're done showering

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Easy to use and keep clean and dry.
customer_reviews.author: cnoyes

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mat and fits my needs perfectly. It is very sturdy and looks exactly as pictured. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Medrano

customer_reviews.title: Molded almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with product. I bought 3 and in less than 2 weeks they were covered in mold and disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: SSharper

customer_reviews.title: GREW MOLD!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for less than 2 months and there’s mold.. And it’s not even cheap compared to other similar products. :( Saw another reviewing saying how could it be advertised to be used in the bathroom when it’s grows mold so easily - exactly! My bathroom is very well ventilated. I’ve thrown away the packaging, not sure if I can get a refund...
customer_reviews.author: Karen Huo

customer_reviews.title: Don't throw the box away
customer_reviews.text: I was initially well pleased with the mat and on third day threw the box away. Cautionary tale... never throw the box away, as on the third day the side border snapped off! Trashed it.
customer_reviews.author: susanne

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for Christmas and loves it! She has a cat that has a thing about peeing on any bath mat she has put down. So far, he has not been tempted with this one! She loves that it is elevated and pretty comfortable for stepping on out of the tub or shower.
customer_reviews.author: Syrenity

customer_reviews.title: I am quite pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with this product. I actually use it as a mat in front of my corner kitchen sink. It fits perfectly and is the first mat I found that fit the space and my decor!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Grows mold easily
customer_reviews.text: Used for mat in a camping shower while my bathroom was being renovated. It grew mold on the bottom, so I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverWild

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, awesome price
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing like getting out of a warm shower and stepping onto a sturdy warm and dry teak shower mat, absolutely love it. It's like showering at a high end spa or gym without the price, trust me a mat this size goes for twice this price, so snatch it up while you can
customer_reviews.author: Jaqua Williams

customer_reviews.title: Stains floor, gets moldy
customer_reviews.text: Loved at first. Then it started leaving a brown color on the floor, couldn’t tell if it was from the screws or a lacquer/stain on the bamboo. Cleaned it up then a month or so later, covered in mildew. Lasted about 8 months
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I feel this was a good buy. Although it easily gets damaged by water
customer_reviews.text: I feel this was a good buy. Although it could easily be damaged by water. If you don't mind lighter water strains -- this is the nature of bamboo, I guess, you would like it. But again, this is not a shower mat; it will fall apart within a week if used as one.
customer_reviews.author: G M

customer_reviews.title: Broke soon after put into use
customer_reviews.text: We bought a bamboo Shower floor three years ago and loved it. We bought this one to replace it. Not only was it smaller, after less than 4 weeks of normal use (two showers per day) the sides cracked and the slats fell out. This almost caused me to fall getting into the shower. As I am not that large, I would caution the regular use of this one by any adult. I have just ordered the same one I used for three years (I thought I had when I ordered this one) and have thrown this broken one out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got Moldy Quick!
customer_reviews.text: Does not dry quickly and thus got moldy very fast. I did my best to try to assist drying, taking it outside the bathroom after a shower, but after a month or so the result was black mold on the underside. Tried cleaning it off as well and it appears stained. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gianna

customer_reviews.title: Black mold magnet
customer_reviews.text: This may be ok in drier climates, but if you live in a humid area this will grow black mold in just a couple of weeks. It doesn't matter if I stand it on edge to dry after each use, it grows mold.
customer_reviews.author: MauiShadow

customer_reviews.title: MOLD!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, functional, but MOLD!!!!! Could never prevent it or remove it. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo wooden un-waterproof shower mat
customer_reviews.text: While this item is the right size, & is actually sturdy enough, it mildews easily. The wood does not have enough waterproof coating to keep the water from damaging the product. I’ll admit that our drain is not the fastest, however rinsing & wiping this mat with just running water caused the thin coating to show damage early on. As it wasn’t an oil based waterproof coating, it wasn’t something I could touch up. Consequently this left the wood exposed, which is why it weekly must be left to air dry, & be treated for mold, as the previous protective coating disintegrated not long after we got it.
customer_reviews.author: C Rich

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Got the item and it broke the first time if using it. I set it flat in the shower and broke. My weight 133lbs yet set for 200lbs and more. Disappointed with it entirely poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Evelina S.

customer_reviews.title: Functional mat lends spa-like style
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bath mat a few months ago to match the other bamboo accessories in my bathroom and have been really impressed with it. The design is stylish and lends a spa-like feeling while the grips on the underside keep the mat securely in place. I was also nervous that the water dripping under the mat might not dry quickly and lead to mold, but have had no such issues. After daily use, the mat is still as beautiful as new and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay H

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a bathmat (I do not use it as ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a bathmat (I do not use it as a shower mat)! I see other reviews that say it gets moldy -- newsflash: even treated wood will eventually grow mold if you leave it in a damp place like a shower!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality, poor assembly
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for something sturdy and solid, but the slats are creaky and uneven. Stepping on different parts of it lets out different snapping sounds. It works as a place to stand when getting out of the shower but is basically a big tripping hazard in a small bathroom. Maybe I just received a bad one, but I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: This item is not stable at all
customer_reviews.text: I have an average built for 5'6" woman, but this thing makes breaking sounds whenever I step on. Not sure how guys could use it without this. I have not noticed any specific cracks or anything yet, but the sound is very loud and made me cautious whenever I use it. Other than that, it's easy to clean around and nice to look at.
customer_reviews.author: shoppingmaster

customer_reviews.title: My spa shower is complete
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something stylish to put in my stand up shower to cover the drain hole. I originally bought one at Bed Bath and it was $100 but returned it because of the price and it wasn’t sturdy. Amazon to the rescue with this affordable one that folds up and is sturdy. Makes me feel as if I’m in a spa in my very own home!
customer_reviews.author: Luisa Rainho

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, showed up slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, seems like a quality product. (FYI, the company's marketing piece that was placed inside the box was incredible looking, I kept it! ) But... the mat showed up split in 3 of the 4 corners. Box was ok, so I'd have to assume it was manufactured and packaged that way. I didn't feel like returning so I just fixed it with some wood glue and clamped it. That should work.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian M.

customer_reviews.title: Compromised by poor structural design
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 6 weeks. Only used once a day. No one heavier than 160 lbs ever set foot on it. There's no good reason a properly made wooden mat should have broken after such a short time of mild use. The point of failure was one of the frame boards, which, on the inner side, was only a 1/4" thick, despite bearing most of a person's weight via bending force. Begin elevated off the ground by the nub feet and having all of the inner slats pressing up underneath this 1/4" lip caused the lip to bear more weight than it could handle, and it snapped clean off. This mat is poorly engineered and it failed as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: The product completely fell apart in the shower. Its structure is flimsy and the nails were exposed to my feet. It turned black and became water logged and got mushy and deteriorated. I bought two and they are in the same condition. I want my money back. I didnt know bamboo exposed to water acted like this?
customer_reviews.author: louanne lewis

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Attractive Bathroom Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This is a good item to have in a bathroom with slippery tile floors. It makes for a comfortable exit point that allows your feet to get dry before you step away from your tub or shower. It is sturdy and well built, in addition to being attractive.
customer_reviews.author: D. Buxman

customer_reviews.title: These mounts are not suitable for outdoor use, they mildewed severely and only one week outside
customer_reviews.text: After only one week of using these mats for our outdoor shower this is how badly they mildewed. Are used bleach and mildew remover and this is the best that they cleaned up. Absolutely disgusting. And of course I missed the return window by one day!
customer_reviews.author: Lori T

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first month
customer_reviews.text: Just little over a month with it, it broke!!! I bough two...the other one is still ok...no abuse on it...average weight guy, just my self at home
customer_reviews.author: pablo fok

customer_reviews.title: Great value, solid quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the bathroom because I was tired of using shower rugs that kept retaining water and growing mildew and mold on the bottom. The wood is solid quality and can support a good amount of weight (I weigh 228) and it supports me easily. The wooden mat has plenty of grip so you don't have to worry about falling over. Definitely worth buying if you're tired of throwing out rugs that stain and wear out year after year.
customer_reviews.author: dodoburrd

customer_reviews.title: Oil and clean once in awhile.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good feel, has the look, at a fair price. However, maintenance is needed to keep it from cracking where planks are nailed together: I kept my unit outside 24/7 in the hot summer sun, clorine, hard cement under it...it took a beating. My next one will be stored and oiled once in awhile. Will buy again:
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use as a bath mat
customer_reviews.text: This is open between the slats, letting the water drip onto the floor. What is the purpose of a bath mat? You have to put another bath mat under it to keep your floor dry.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We are very impressed with this mat. We bought it too place outside of the shower. It's very comfortable and sturdy. It also adds a nice poop of color in our completely white bathroom. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Nifty bamboo bath mat used outside of new walk-in shower.
customer_reviews.text: Put this outside my new walk in shower glass swing door. It is stable and good traction to step out onto with wet feet. Then I can safely step down onto the bath mat. I am happy with how nice the bamboo mat looks on the new medium Gris gray floor tile and the white washed new teak vanity, as well as the Benj Moore Annapolis Gray walls. The bamboo is a nice bright spot in our white, gray, and black granite vanity top in a windowless small bath.
customer_reviews.author: pat l.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations considering what I paid. I use it while changing out of my wetsuit after surfing. I can rinse off while on it and then change out of my suit while on sand, gravel or asphalt without getting everything dirty in the process. I then rinse it off and stow it away in my car for the next session.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor showering while camping!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use while camping at the beach with our trailer. Our trailer has an outdoor shower, so this allows us to keep our feet from getting sandy or muddy while using the shower. A perfect application!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: We were forced to replace our bath "rugs" because our cat likes to pee on them. I bought 3 of these and they not only solved the problem but they also gave our bathrooms a little "spa" touch. I love them.... the cat is unimpressed!
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: This is so much better than a regular cloth bath mat!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a solution for my bulky cloth bathmat which caused problems in my washer. I found the perfect solution in this study yet beautiful looking bamboo mat. Who knew? I just wipe it down, et voila!
customer_reviews.author: Hilde

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: This mat was great, until we started using it. We had it in our trailer bathroom where it was not exposed to water, maybe a bit of steam? We stayed in our trailer for 5 days, and noticed that the bamboo is cracked around one of the screws and will soon fall apart, but because it is out of the 30 day return period, we are stuck with it. Poor quality and a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it holds mold underneath. Good looking and study. Also slippery. The design needs to change. Great concept, poorly executed. But they took it back and refunded me quickly. I appreciate this. Wish it didnt hold mold.
customer_reviews.author: RPhillips and MPhillips, h/w

customer_reviews.title: Does not wear well in the outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Product does not wear well in the outdoors place these tiles in an outdoor shower within five days turned to the dark black colors very difficult to clean
customer_reviews.author: Montalbano

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I barely purchased this item in May of this year and look at all the mold on the wood. This is unacceptable not to mention unhealthy. This item should be removed from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mister M

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with it and can't wait to finish the remodel so we can put it on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: John Stewart

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: High quality, great finish, and the grips hold it to the floor very well so you don't slide around when getting out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: branzig

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used 2 and in the first 3 weeks they have already molded at the bottom I sprayed the other 2 with a rubber coating and within 2 weeks they have also started to mold. I purchased 2 other similar one from a different company 4 and a half years ago and to date have no mold. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great feels great but got very moldy
customer_reviews.text: Grew mold in a month became a Haven for green fuzzy mold on the bottom of the bamboo. Why tho? I realize now why would you make a product intended for use as a bath mat out of a mterial that doesn't absorb or evaporate water.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ignatenko

customer_reviews.title: ... have two of these in my shower and really like them. I needed something to give me a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these in my shower and really like them. I needed something to give me a little height to reach the diverter on my shower head and this was exactly the right height. Plus it's comfortable on my feet (which are very painful) and the water flows right through it.
customer_reviews.author: kipper

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this a zero I would. Used three times and the side broke loose. The metal hinges left a permanent mark on the tile and basically it just isn’t worth the two cents used to make it. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for mould and splitting
customer_reviews.text: This went mouldy within 3 weeks of using and even after drying and airing it continued. It then broke after three months of use. I could have invested in bath mats for all three bathrooms with what I spent on this. A bit disappointing as this was money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not super sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should, but feels flimsy and uncomfortable under my feet. I can feel the slats bending underneath my weight (~200lbs). Other than the fear of breaking through, it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: James Williams

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I had to cut it down to fit my camper shower but I knew this was slightly larger than my space. Its very sturdy and quality built.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Molds quite quickly even with light use
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice for bit, but it molds very quickly with moisture. Not great for a bathroom environment. A normal cleaning won't do. I've had this for about a year and I continuously have to bleach it to kill the mold. Some of the wood has rotted off into little pieces. Perhaps for a larger bathroom with lots of ventilation and placed where it can't get wet, but other than that, it's going to be a health hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsure Quality
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this bath mat. I purchased in Aug 2018 and it was fine until a week ago Dec. 19th 2018 when the sides cracked. It's too bad since it is a nice looking mat - just questionable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product.....questionable weight rating
customer_reviews.text: This product out of the box is gorgeous and functional, with that said i cant use it........only the wife......at 190lbs......it creaks and pops......I’m afraid I’m gonna break it. Wished it wad a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MAJC

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I have a spa at home!
customer_reviews.text: Great mat with a sturdy design. Don’t have any issues with mold as some reviews state. I also don’t leave the mat wet after stepping on it. I like to stand it up, folded a bit at the hinge. What to feel like you’re at a spa in your own bathroom? Get this Mat!
customer_reviews.author: Bert G.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: what a mess! water drip through and make the floor a wet mess underneath - what is the point
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, comfortable, safe.
customer_reviews.text: Two of them are just right in my shower. Comfortable on my feet and don't move around. I did replace the original screws with stainless steel ones as the original started to corrode .
customer_reviews.author: C. Kemsley Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a shower floor that doesn't drain properly because of the poor tile job. I needed a mat that would raise the "floor" up so you are not standing in water when showering. This mat is perfect for that and it is easy to clean, looks good and is sturdy. I can recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought it so I could sit on it because my marble seat in my shower was too cold. It makes a big difference. I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: C. Jackson Blair

customer_reviews.title: Not mold resistant
customer_reviews.text: We were using this as a mat outside of our shower. After using it for two weeks it was completely covered in black mold.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Denny

customer_reviews.title: not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: i decided to give a bamboo mat a try. it was smaller than i needed for my walk in shower and i found it slippery when it was wet which made me nervous when i was standing on it.
customer_reviews.author: tess2344

customer_reviews.title: The simple comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I found it sooner. It is so much better then the rugs. It is simple, appealing and functional. Everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ole

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I was disappointed, wasn’t gonna leave a bad review but since I got an email from amazon asking about it. I Got it for my outside shower, haven’t even used it yet and it looks old already, thought the bamboo color would stay nice but was mistaken.
customer_reviews.author: SALVATORE

customer_reviews.title: Non-absorbant
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product at all. After a few days of use I can say that it does not absorb water, there is in fact water all over my bathroom floor. It's a nice aesthetic but will have to get something that actually absorbs water.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Luck

customer_reviews.title: Great non-slip floor mat
customer_reviews.text: I use this for our outdoor shower on our camper. Works great. Very sturdy and easy to spray off the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I wish I read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Black Mold EVERYWHERE! This is so disappointing and so gross. I wish I looked at the reviews before I purchased, this mat is NOT mold free.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: the mat is pretty solid with overall good quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the mat is pretty solid with overall good quality. The parameter of the may is solid. I do believe the interior wood slots could be reinforced for better strength. The size was a little smaller than I anticipated. The pictures make it look a little wider. I should have referenced dimensions. The color is a little lighter than it looks in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bamboo mat to replace a teak mat I had used for several years. The Bamboo mat looks great and the cost was half of the teak.
customer_reviews.author: pforlando

customer_reviews.title: falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of July 2018 and it is already falling apart. The end is separating and collapsing when stepped on. I am not especially heavy so I attribute it to poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Indoor only
customer_reviews.text: NOT indoor/outdoor. Indoor only unless you want it to look like this after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor showers or Japanese baths.
customer_reviews.text: Creaks when stood upon. Has plastic coated "feet" covering metal screws on the bottom which could cause problems with ceramic flooring. Would work best on outside showers or cement floors.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Bob

customer_reviews.title: Absolutley beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love, these Bamboo Mats !!! Just replaced , and added beautiful shower clear glass doors. I was replacing the shower mat and wanted something other than vinyl, saw these , ordered 4 and layed them side by side and , WOW !!!!My shower now looks like a SPA !!! Again , Love these mats !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BAMBOO MAT SAVES the DAY! (No frequent washings; no slipping and sliding!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. It solved a lot of problems associated with a large family using the regular synthetic bath mats. It protects the feet from touching the floor, dries quickly and is decorative in a 'natural' way. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zakia Iman Shahbaz

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after a few days
customer_reviews.text: This mat cracked after only a few days of use. I was expecting a much better quality for the price I paid. I don't recommend this product. Update: After 7 months of use, it completely fell apart today. I specify that I weigh 190 pounds...
customer_reviews.author: Bly

customer_reviews.title: Broke!
customer_reviews.text: The product is beautiful. The bamboo looks really nice. But the build quality is just not what I expected. Corner joint broke after 3rd use. I weigh about 200lb, and apparently that's above reasonable limits for this item.
customer_reviews.author: jtsnake

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Felt creaky under foot and got COVERED in mold on the bottom within one month of using it. Super gross.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Antolino

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Spa Quality
customer_reviews.text: Someone else poste a picture of a moldy bottom side. All I have to say is, "Did you think this product was self cleaning?" The product comes with easy care instructions and can last as long as you follow them. I use this item in my shower of my Airbnb and this is my second time buying the product. Clean it and it will last!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: This mat is a good idea badly executed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing: I bought two of them, one broke after six month and the other after a year (even after reinforcing them with nails and rubber feet). No refund to expect. This mat is a good idea badly executed. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blanc

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, not built for use
customer_reviews.text: This product did not last 4 months.. it started falling apart after two and completely came apart before 4
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy.
customer_reviews.text: It will fade with sun and water- but we don't mind. We like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience waist my money
customer_reviews.text: First week I get mold all over the bamboo mat. Cheap material
customer_reviews.author: margarita Izquierdo

customer_reviews.title: Cracking after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased February 26, 2020. Have had to clean off mold twice and now it is cracking. Description says 1 year limited warranty but returns are closed after 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Manzy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I have been using traditional shower mats ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have been using traditional shower mats for years and always find myself grossed out by the mold and wetness factor so I decided to purchase this product and love it. It is sturdy and non slippery. Every week I flip it up when I mop the bathroom floor and that is all the clean up it requires. No smells or mold
customer_reviews.author: Sara Master

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Keep your bamboo mat dry and you will not have mold problems, do not leave it in the bathtub soaked in water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid easy piece with no assembly. Great purchase.great size!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra white

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo floor mat. Price point and quality are righ.t
customer_reviews.text: Product is of nice quality, doesn't appear to have warped through multiple uses. The only issue is that after the first week of use, you begin to see the wear and tear on the part you stand on, which leads to the outer edges looking new and the center look more worn.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer of Product

customer_reviews.title: Flip it over.
customer_reviews.text: Mold infested less than one month of use. Not sealed at joints. It happened to both of the mats I purchased same shower.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I placed a soft cotton mat over this. The bamboo platform allows it to dry out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Angell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very sturdy and easy to clean. I like that it has the knobs on the bottom so you're not standing in water and it's very convenient that it folds in half to save space for storage
customer_reviews.author: Jahx Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Moldy out of the package
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the reviews that say this product molds easily. Straight out of the package, this bamboo mat was covered in green mold.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this new bath math
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this new bath math, quality seems pretty good at the moment
customer_reviews.author: javier benjamin castillo

customer_reviews.title: Attractive mat that looks great in our tropical themed bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Attractive mat that looks great in our tropical themed bathroom. We've gotten compliments. If you look closely the workmanship is less than incredible though. Some of the boards aren't perfectly straight.
customer_reviews.author: Ashe

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I got two of them and pushed them together bc it was cheaper than buying one of the larger sized ones from other vendors and they don’t slip out of place at all. Very sturdy, super cute. I’ve had multiple people ask me where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: Very slippery. It's beautiful to look at, but I almost fell getting out of the shower onto it.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Yo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Great color, size, & I love that it folds in half - perfect for our Camper Van / outdoor showers!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Non-soggy bath mat :)
customer_reviews.text: High quality, and better than any cloth one that would get gross and soggy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: yanksNYC

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I don't give this 5 stars is ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I don't give this 5 stars is because under my grown-man weight, it feels a bit flimsy. Can't be helped probably -- and no, I don't need a diet. :)
customer_reviews.author: MrSax

customer_reviews.title: A great addition for any shower
customer_reviews.text: Love it: use it for my outdoor shower. So much nicer than standing on yucky concrete. Sure it would also work great indoors. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eva M. Langan

customer_reviews.title: I am in love !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft it is on the feet and how great it looks in our restroom it is a must buy
customer_reviews.author: tripsysmomma

customer_reviews.title: Mold holder!! Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge disappointment. The first time I took it out to clean it (after being in the shower for only about 2 weeks) there was mold all over the underside. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Been using as a 'bath mat' for several months now and I like how it keeps my feet away from a wet floor and that it does not collect hair. Some discoloration because of the water but I still like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: hula princess

product_meta.title: Bambusi Luxury Bamboo Bath Mat - Non-Slip Shower Floor Mat for Bathroom and Spa Folds for Easy Storage - Indoor and Outdoor Use - 18 x 24 Inches
feature_bullets: STYLISH, PRACTICAL DESIGN: The Bambüsi wooden floor mat gives your bathroom a stylish look, bringing your space a mix of nature and style. It provides a comfortable exit point that allows your feet to dry before you step away from your shower, tub, or spa.

PERFECT FOR INDOOR & OUTDOORS: Its versatile design makes it ideal for an outdoor shower to keep your feet from getting sandy. Use it in the pool area, backyard, doormat or indoor as bathroom shower mat or decorative piece. Bamboo mat measures 18” x 24” inches.

WATERPROOF, STURDY & ECO-FRIEDLY: We constructed this mat with 100% Moso bamboo, a renewable resource material that is eco-friendly, sturdy, and durable to last for years. It's slatted designed provides optimal air circulation that makes it dry faster.

SLIP RESISTANT: Your wood shower mat is fully assembled and ready to use. The bamboo shower mat comes with 6 soft pads which are securely screwed on to prevent from sliding and stay firmly on the floor.

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We take pride in the quality of our bamboo floor mat and offer a 100% money-back guarantee in case it fails to live up to your expectations! Buy our wood mat, try it and if, for any reason, you think that it was not for you, we will be happy to refund every penny you paid.
